titles.title: Parental Responsibility and Taxpayer Protection Amendment of 1998
To amend title 11 of the United States Code to make debts to governmental units for the care and maintenance of minor children nondischargeable.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on the Judiciary.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Commercial and Administrative Law.

bill.summary: 4/22/1998--Introduced. Parental Responsibility and Taxpayer Protection Amendment of 1998 - Amends Federal bankruptcy law to deny a discharge in bankruptcy of a debt owed by an individual to a governmental unit for costs incurred for the care or maintenance of the debtor's minor child.
